lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "There were very serious discussions last fall but we didn't pull it off," the source said in a reference to the assassination in November of former Renault chairman Georges Besse.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The analysts told Reuters that at a New York briefing Chrysler treasurer Fred Zuckerman outlined his company's agreement with Renault to assume AMC's debt as well as 332 mln dlrs in unfunded pension liabilities, though the latter is not included valuing the transaction.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analysts quoted Chrysler officials as having told them that the deal includes payment to Renault of 200 mln dlrs principal in the form of a 10-year note at eight pct interest, 35 mln dlrs cash for Renault's equity in AMC's finance subsidiary, 25 mln dlrs in cash for "transaction fees" in connection with the acquisition and 522 mln dlrs worth of Chrysler stock to be paid AMC shareholders.

lst.str: "There were very serious discussions last fall but we didn't pull it off," the source said in a reference to the assassination in November of former Renault chairman Georges Besse.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analysts quoted Chrysler officials as having told them that the deal includes payment to Renault of 200 mln dlrs principal in the form of a 10-year note at eight pct interest, 35 mln dlrs cash for Renault's equity in AMC's finance subsidiary, 25 mln dlrs in cash for "transaction fees" in connection with the acquisition and 522 mln dlrs worth of Chrysler stock to be paid AMC shareholders.
